products.title: Blue (1156)
products.description: The velux energy blinds offers variable blackout and an insulation effect of up to 19%. The double-pleated blackout cloth has an aluminium honeycomb structure within for significantly improved insulation. Energy blinds are not fixed at the top of the bottom, so you can position them exactly where you need them for light control and privacy. Blackout effect. Flexible and stepless positioning. Improved insulation.

products.title: Midnight Blue (7058)
products.description: Low maintenance, moisture resistant venetian blinds are perfect for bathrooms and kitchens. Their unique cordless design eliminates unsightly hanging cords and allows you to easily tilt the slats in any direction for optimum light adjustment. Perfect for high humidity rooms. Easy to clean. Optimum light adjustment. Preserves your view whole providing privacy. No hanging cords. Installs in minutes.
